description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The award-winning EA SPORTS™ Fight Night series is back to defend its title as the undisputed champion of boxing videogames. EA SPORTS™ Fight Night Round 3 delivers the crown jewel in this top-rated sports game trilogy. Film-quality graphics establish EA SPORTS™ Fight Night Round 3 as the best looking and playing Xbox 360 sports game on the market. The graphics showcase devastating punch impacts unparalleled in any game or film. EA SPORTS™ Fight Night Round 3 – the closest thing to being in the ring without getting punched. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
